item.description:
Don't forget to vote in the special senate election on January 19 before coming to Hennessy's! Then come on out to watch the results with us!

The monthly meetup at Hennessy's is a casual gathering to give us lonely MA Republicans an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees!

Come whenever you can (we're usually around till at least 8:30) for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. There's no agenda, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...

**********

The meetups are very informal and generally there is no agenda with the exception of announcements around 7:00. If you have something to share about a campaign, an event, a website, an organization, hereâ€™s your chance to tell the group. ** If you have an announcement, please let me know when you arrive.

**********

You can find us in the back section by the TV and fireplace or tell the hostess you're with the Meetup group. We're usually there for a few hours.

If there is no event at the Garden, parking is $10 at the Government Center Garage. Haymarket and Govt Center are the nearest MBTA stations.


Hope you can make it! Invite your friends!


Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 20-30 attendees!


Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and on Facebook.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk to the back section near the fireplace & TV.
item.name: Boston Republican January Meetup
